import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from"react";import Card from'@mui/material/Card';import CardContent from'@mui/material/CardContent';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{motion}from"framer-motion";import'./Events.css';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventPage=_ref=>{let{theme}=_ref;const[selectedEvent,setSelectedEvent]=useState(null);const[eventData,setEventData]=useState([]);const detailsRef=useRef(null);// Example event data, replace with data fetching (e.g., from an API or Firebase)
useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('https://rushikersclub-backend.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/events');setEventData(response.data);};fetchEvents();if(selectedEvent&&detailsRef.current){detailsRef.current.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}},[selectedEvent]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-page".concat(theme),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"page-title",children:"Latest Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-container",children:eventData.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.05},className:"card-container",onClick:()=>setSelectedEvent(event),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"event-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.name,className:"event-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{className:"event-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"event-name",children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-date",children:event.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-description",children:event.description})]})]},event.id)},event.id))}),selectedEvent&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-details",ref:detailsRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"details-title",children:selectedEvent.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:selectedEvent.imageUrl,alt:selectedEvent.name,className:"details-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:selectedEvent.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:selectedEvent.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"close-button",onClick:()=>setSelectedEvent(null),children:"Close"})]})]});};export default EventPage;
